senses.sense_definition: Having, consisting of, or bounded by three lines.

examples.text: The <w>trilinear</w> interpolation method is commonly used in computer graphics to smooth 3D textures.
A <w>trilinear</w> chart can effectively display the relationship between three distinct variables.

senses.sense_definition: A set of three coordinates representing the algebraic distances of a point to the three sides of a surrounding triangle.

examples.text: In advanced geometry, <w>trilinears</w> are often used to determine the precise center of a triangle.
The student calculated the <w>trilinears</w> for the point relative to the triangle's sides.
